All methods listed here

---

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(DT)
library(here)
load(here("data", "mrmn.rdata"))
names(dat) <- metadata$names

dat %>%
  mutate(`Code repository (URL)` = trimws(`Code repository (URL)`)) %>%
  mutate(`Code repository (URL)` = paste0('<a href = ', shQuote(`Code repository (URL)`), "target='_blank'", '>', `Code repository (URL)`, '</a>')) %>%
  filter(`Entry type` == "Analytical method") %>%
  select(`title`, `Code repository (URL)`) %>%
  datatable(escape = FALSE)
```
